It converts MP3 data into PCM format, processes audio segments, and supports streaming via asynchronous generator. All data flows are contained within the module, and there are no external network calls besides gTTS, which is intended for speech synthesis. No hardcoded credentials or malicious operations are present. The use of asyncio for streaming is typical, albeit with a less common event loop creation method, but not malicious.",
